preparation.name: Preheat oven
preparation.description: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).

preparation.name: Prepare vegetables
preparation.description: In a large baking dish, combine diced eggplant, sliced zucchini, diced bell pepper, chopped tomatoes, diced onion, and minced garlic.

preparation.name: Season and bake
preparation.description: Drizzle olive oil over the vegetables, add fresh thyme, salt, and black pepper. Toss to coat evenly. Bake for 45-50 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender.

preparation.name: Serve
preparation.description: Serve ratatouille as a side dish or over cooked pasta.

preparation.name: Brown chicken
preparation.description: In a large pot, brown chicken thighs in bacon fat over medium-high heat. Remove and set aside.

preparation.name: Sauté vegetables
preparation.description: In the same pot, sauté chopped onion, minced garlic, diced bacon, and sliced carrots until vegetables are tender.

preparation.name: Deglaze and simmer
preparation.description: Deglaze the pot with red wine, scraping up any browned bits. Add chicken broth, tomato paste, and flour. Return chicken to the pot, add fresh thyme, and simmer for 1.5 to 2 hours.

preparation.name: Serve
preparation.description: Serve Coq au Vin with crusty bread or over mashed potatoes.

preparation.name: Activate yeast
preparation.description: In a bowl, combine warm milk, sugar, and active dry yeast. Let it sit for 5-10 minutes until foamy.

preparation.name: Mix dough
preparation.description: In a large mixing bowl, combine flour, salt, and cold unsalted butter (cubed). Add the yeast mixture and eggs. Mix until a dough forms.

preparation.name: Fold and refrigerate
preparation.description: Roll out the dough, fold in layers with butter, and refrigerate for 1 hour. Repeat the folding process 2 more times, chilling between each fold.

preparation.name: Shape and proof
preparation.description: Roll out the dough, cut into triangles, and roll each triangle into a croissant shape. Proof the croissants for 1-2 hours.

preparation.name: Bake
preparation.description: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Bake the croissants for 15-20 minutes until golden brown.

preparation.name: Serve
preparation.description: Serve the freshly baked croissants with your favorite jam or enjoy them plain.

preparation.name: Prepare ingredients
preparation.description: Cook sushi rice and let it cool. Slice fresh fish, julienned cucumber, and slice avocado.

preparation.name: Roll sushi
preparation.description: Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi rolling mat. Wet your hands and spread sushi rice over the nori. Add fish, cucumber, and avocado.

preparation.name: Roll and slice
preparation.description: Roll the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat. Wet a sharp knife and slice the roll into bite-sized pieces.

preparation.name: Serve
preparation.description: Serve sushi rolls with soy sauce, pickled ginger, and wasabi.

preparation.name: Rehydrate wakame
preparation.description: Soak dried wakame seaweed in water for 5 minutes. Drain and set aside.

preparation.name: Make dashi
preparation.description: In a pot, bring dashi to a simmer. Dissolve miso paste in a small amount of dashi and add it to the pot.

preparation.name: Add ingredients
preparation.description: Add tofu, rehydrated wakame, chopped green onions, soy sauce, and mirin. Simmer for 5 minutes.

preparation.name: Serve
preparation.description: Serve miso soup hot. Enjoy as an appetizer or side dish.

preparation.name: Soak noodles
preparation.description: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes. Drain and set aside.

preparation.name: Stir-fry tofu and shrimp
preparation.description: In a wok, heat vegetable oil. Add cubed tofu and shrimp, stir-fry until cooked.

preparation.name: Cook eggs
preparation.description: Push tofu and shrimp to one side of the wok. Pour beaten eggs into the empty side. Scramble and cook until set.

preparation.name: Add noodles and sauce
preparation.description: Add soaked noodles and Pad Thai sauce to the wok. Toss everything together until well combined.

preparation.name: Serve
preparation.description: Serve Pad Thai hot, garnished with bean sprouts, chopped green onions, crushed peanuts, and lime wedges.

preparation.name: Cook chicken
preparation.description: In a pan, cook sliced chicken until browned. Set aside.

preparation.name: Prepare curry
preparation.description: In the same pan, simmer green curry paste in coconut milk. Add diced eggplant, sliced bell pepper, and bamboo shoots.

preparation.name: Season and simmer
preparation.description: Season with fish sauce and brown sugar. Add cooked chicken and simmer until the vegetables are tender.

preparation.name: Add Thai basil
preparation.description: Stir in Thai basil leaves just before serving.

preparation.name: Serve
preparation.description: Serve green curry chicken over steamed jasmine rice.
